name: War Chaplain

trait.name: Divine Orders
text: As a bonus action, the war chaplain commands an ally within 30 feet of it to make one attack against a creature the chaplain attacked this round.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: The war chaplain is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The war chaplain has the following Cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): light, resistance, sacred flame, spare the dying
• 1st level (4 slots): bless, cure wounds, healing word, protection from evil and good
• 2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, spiritual weapon

action.name: Multiattack
text: The war chaplain makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: War God's Healing (Recharge 5-6)
text: The war chaplain targets one ally within 30 feet engaged in melee combat. The target regains 10 (3d6) hit points.

spells: light, resistance, sacred flame, spare the dying, bless, cure wounds, healing word, protection from evil and good, lesser restoration, spiritual weapon, beacon of hope
